text: I'm using GLMakie v0.1.23 in JuliaPro 1.5.3-1 with a new installation of this version of JuliaPro and GLMakie as the only package loaded.  When I do f = Figure(resolution = (1400, 1100)) from REPL, a separate window opens (desired). When I do the same using shift-enter from a line in a Julia file, the plot opens in an Atom window (undesired).  Using inline!(false) has no effect. How can I force the plot into a separate window?

text: Just for the record, I have the same problem with vscode (I’m running on a mac, big sur).  Although if you deselect “use plot plane” in preferences, nothing displays at all. Calling display(fig) puts it in the right window. I now look forward to learning how to use all of this power! Thanks.
